components.legend: Will you need an interpreter at court?
components.name: auto_name__78

components.html: If you require an interpreter, you must notify the court immediately so that one can be arranged.

components.label: If you or the person to be protected has a disability for which you require special assistance or facilities, please state what is needed. The court staff will then get in touch with you if necessary.
components.name: auto_name__80

components.label: Please say whether the court needs to make any special arrangements for you or the person to be protected, to attend court (e.g. providing you with a separate waiting room from the respondent or other security provision).
components.name: auto_name__81
